[i]Bravery of The Lionheart[/i] – Whenever Eldigan becomes blocked by more than one creature, he gets +2/+2 for each creature blocking him.
[i]High Regard[/i] – Other Knights you control have haste.
[i]Promote[/i] – Whenever another legendary creature you control dies, transform Eldigan.
